entry.title: Stabilized weighted reduced order methods for parametrized advection-dominated optimal control problems governed by partial differential equations with random inputs

entry.summary: Article by Volker John, Christian Merdon, Marwa Zainelabdeen DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/jnma-2023-0118

entry.title: Obtaining higher-order Galerkin accuracy when the boundary is polygonally approximated

entry.title: Optimal evaluation of symmetry-adaptedn-correlations via recursive contraction of sparse symmetric tensors
